Uses of Interface
com.joliciel.talismane.parser.TransitionSystem

  • Packages that use TransitionSystem 
    Package Description
    com.joliciel.talismane
    Entry-point package for Talismane - for simple usage code samples, see the com.joliciel.talismane.examples package.
    com.joliciel.talismane.parser
    Transition-based dependency parsing ( Parser), evaluation ( ParserEvaluator), and output artefacts (ParseConfiguration, DependencyNode).

    • Uses of TransitionSystem in com.joliciel.talismane

      Methods in com.joliciel.talismane that return TransitionSystem 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TransitionSystem TalismaneSession.getTransitionSystem() 

    • Uses of TransitionSystem in com.joliciel.talismane.parser

      Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.parser that implement TransitionSystem 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ArcEagerTransitionSystem
      An arc-eager Shift-Reduce transition system, as described in Nivre 2009 Dependency Parsing, Chapter 3, in which right-depedencies are attached as soon as possible, rather than waiting until all left-dependencies have been attached.
      class  ShiftReduceTransitionSystem
      The arc-standard Shift-Reduce transition system, as described in Nivre 2009 Dependency Parsing, Chapter 3, augmented with an explicit Reduce transition to allow for corpora with unattached nodes: artificially attaching these nodes to the root node could induce non-projectivity.
      Methods in com.joliciel.talismane.parser that return TransitionSystem 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TransitionSystem Parser.getTransitionSystem()
      The transition system used by this parser to make parse decisions.
      TransitionSystem TransitionBasedParser.getTransitionSystem() 
      static TransitionSystem TransitionSystem.getTransitionSystem(MachineLearningModel model)
      Get the transition system corresponding to the model provided.
      Constructors in com.joliciel.talismane.parser with parameters of type TransitionSystem 
      Constructor and Description
      TransitionBasedParser(DecisionMaker decisionMaker, TransitionSystem transitionSystem, java.util.Set<ParseConfigurationFeature<?>> parseFeatures, int beamWidth, boolean propagatePosTaggerBeam, ParseComparisonStrategy parseComparisonStrategy, int maxAnalysisTimePerSentence, int minFreeMemory, TalismaneSession session)
